title: Dr.
questions:
Good morning,

I use a 683 Small Animal Ventilator to work on breathing mechanics, but since I am working also on reptiles, I would like to know if it is possible to reduce the pumping frequency below the ventilators given minimum of 28 breaths/minute.

Any help on how to use this ventilator at lower frequencies will be highly appreciated.

Best regards,

Wilfried Klein

Dear Madam or Sir,

Could you please send me an offer for Item 725270 (Non-Contact InfraRed Thermometer)?

Best regards,
Vera Russmann

title: Mrs.
questions: Hi,\r\n\r\nWe are looking for tubing to connect our vaporizer to a nose cone and induction box via a Y-splitter (with stopcock). I was unable to find this option in the catalog. Can you tell me what the product number is? We are ordering the 500108 induction box + tubing from you. Thank you
